author: Fextralife
description:
Elden Ring Nightreign - MEET THE NIGHTFARERS (Classes)
In this Elden Ring Nightreign video, we're going to be taking a look at the four Nightfarers of Elden Ring Nightreignm or the four classes, if you will. These are the four characters that you're going to get to choose from any given run or playthrough of the game. The full launch of the game will include 8 of these, but for now we only have 4. So in this video I will run you through what these classes do, what they are capable of and what their skills to hepl you better decide which one you want to play. Come the Network test in a couple of days.

Elden Ring Nightreign Wiki: https://eldenringnightreign.wiki.fextralife.com/Elden+Ring+Nightreign+Wiki
Elden Ring Wiki: https://eldenring.wiki.fextralife.com/Nightreign

Timestamp
0:00 - Elden Ring Nightreign Classes
0:25 - Nightreign Nightfarers
2:50 - Wylder
5:29 - Guardian
7:27 - Duchess
9:44 - Recluse
15:01 - Relics

Don't forget to like the video and subscribe to our channel for mo
title: Elden Ring Nightreign - MEET THE NIGHTFARERS (Classes)

author: Fextralife
description:
I Played 7 Hours of Elden Ring Nightreign - NEW GAMEPLAY From Network Test (50 Weapons Shown)
In this Elden Ring Nightreign video, I'm going to be talking about my impressions of playing the game at an event in Frankfurt, Germany, a couple of weeks ago. I'll walk you through what's happening on the screen, point out details that you may not understand, and explain things thoroughly. At the end of the video, I'll share what I liked about Nightreign and what I didn't.

Elden Ring Nightreign Wiki: https://eldenringnightreign.wiki.fextralife.com/Elden+Ring+Nightreign+Wiki
Elden Ring Wiki: https://eldenring.wiki.fextralife.com/Nightreign

Timestamp
0:00 - Elden Ring Nightreign Gameplay Impressions
1:29 - Nightreign Gameplay Breakdown
21:52 - My thoughts about Nightreign

Don't forget to like the video and subscribe to our channel for more!
